analysis.description:
BasicToken.blockListed (/unique_chucks/46/0x46e8b4890ff60aa2a37c5a4514cb38ee359f70b3.sol#68-69) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- transfer (/unique_chucks/46/0x46e8b4890ff60aa2a37c5a4514cb38ee359f70b3.sol#73-91)
	- transferFrom (/unique_chucks/46/0x46e8b4890ff60aa2a37c5a4514cb38ee359f70b3.sol#112-135)

Crowdsale.fifthWeekBonus (/unique_chucks/46/0x46e8b4890ff60aa2a37c5a4514cb38ee359f70b3.sol#437) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- icoTokens (/unique_chucks/46/0x46e8b4890ff60aa2a37c5a4514cb38ee359f70b3.sol#635-664)

RefundableCrowdsale.finalization (/unique_chucks/46/0x46e8b4890ff60aa2a37c5a4514cb38ee359f70b3.sol#938-945) is declared view but changes state variables:
	- RefundableCrowdsale._goalReached

Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/46/0x46e8b4890ff60aa2a37c5a4514cb38ee359f70b3.sol#666-705) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/46/0x46e8b4890ff60aa2a37c5a4514cb38ee359f70b3.sol#700-701)

CrowdsaleFunctions.bountyFunds (/unique_chucks/46/0x46e8b4890ff60aa2a37c5a4514cb38ee359f70b3.sol#787-799) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary[i],tokens[i]) (/unique_chucks/46/0x46e8b4890ff60aa2a37c5a4514cb38ee359f70b3.sol#797-798)

CrowdsaleFunctions.grantReservedToken (/unique_chucks/46/0x46e8b4890ff60aa2a37c5a4514cb38ee359f70b3.sol#802-814) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/46/0x46e8b4890ff60aa2a37c5a4514cb38ee359f70b3.sol#812)

CrowdsaleFunctions.transferToken (/unique_chucks/46/0x46e8b4890ff60aa2a37c5a4514cb38ee359f70b3.sol#825-839) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/46/0x46e8b4890ff60aa2a37c5a4514cb38ee359f70b3.sol#838-839)

CrowdsaleFunctions.bountyFunds has external calls inside a loop:
	- token.mint(beneficiary[i],tokens[i]) (/unique_chucks/46/0x46e8b4890ff60aa2a37c5a4514cb38ee359f70b3.sol#797-798)
Parameter '_owner' of BasicToken.balanceOf (/unique_chucks/46/0x46e8b4890ff60aa2a37c5a4514cb38ee359f70b3.sol#96-99) is not in mixedCase
